properties.name: spring.modulith.default-async-termination
properties.description: Whether to configure defaults for the async processing termination, namely to wait for task completion for 2 seconds. See TaskExecutionProperties for details.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart.lock-timeout
properties.description: How long to wait to try to acquire the shared Spring Integration Lock before attempting to proces incomplete event publications on startup

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart.lock-name
properties.description: the name of the shared Spring Integration Lock to acquire before attempting to process incomplete event publications on startup

properties.name: spring.modulith.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart
properties.description: Whether to republish outstanding event publications on restarts of the application.

deprecation.reason: Moved to spring.modulith.events namespace. To be removed in 1.4.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart
properties.description: Whether to republish outstanding event publications on restarts of the application.
